content:
To find the flag within an Alternate Data Stream (ADS) in a file located in C:\Users\Offsec\Desktop\streamtest, you can use the command:

more < C:\Users\Offsec\Desktop\streamtest:hiddenflag.txt

This will display the contents of the ADS named "hiddenflag.txt" within the file "streamtest".

You can also use a tool such as streams.exe (part of the Sysinternals Suite) to list all the Alternate Data Streams present in the folder or drive. Once you have the name of the stream you can cat it using the command:

type C:\Users\Offsec\Desktop\streamtest:hiddenflag.txt

This will display the contents of the stream named "hiddenflag.txt" within the file "streamtest"
